1.content:
Michael Scott arrived at Dunder Mifflin and today is all female day where only the female employees show up for work except Michael. He arrived early to set up a female empowerment presentation (he doesn’t realise how sexist it it).

Michael is near the reception minding his own business until ZAP.

Michael wakes up confused and on a strange carpet like survives. Michael realises that he is the size of an ant (probably those mysterious vitamins Dwight gave him).

Michael panics until he hears a BOOM

Who walks in
1.title: Shrunk In The Office

choices: Michael jumps on to Pams shoes
Pam stops in front of him
Pam see something on the floor
11.content:
Michael sees Pam walk into the office

Pam is wearing White blouse with a pink cardigan, a skirt, pantyhoses and black high heels

Michael is too small for Pam to see and compared to Michael Pam’s legs are the size of multiple large skyscrapers. Every step Pam takes creates an earthquake for Michael.

Michael tried to get her attention but it’s no use

So what happens next.
11.title: Pam Beesly

choices: Pam goes to the break room
112.content:
7:55 am:
“What the hell? Where is everyone?” Pam thinks to herself as she walked behind her reception desk. Pam routinely hangs her coat, places her purse next to her cpu, and sits down in her chair and turns on her computer.
————————————————-
6:30am Jim walked into Dunder Mifflin about an hour and a half before Pam or anyone else. His goal: move Dwights desk into the break room as a classic prank. But Jim didn’t get too far into the prank until a beam of light zapped him near reception, shrinking him down to 1cm. Jim found himself amongst giant pencils, sticky notes, and a Jumbotron which turned out to be Pams computer.. “oh my gosh.. what.. what just happened..?” Jim said immensely shocked. “Ok, I’m on Pams desk... I’ll just wait for her to arrive and get her attention. She’ll help me I know it.
————————————————
8:30am: Michael had no luck getting Pams attention from the floor when she had walked in. He decided his best course of action was to climb her shoe, up her pantyhose, and to her shoulder to get her attention. Michael did just that. He grunted as he pulled his 1cm tall self onto Pams shoe. The expanse before him was daunting, but the manager was determined. He leapt onto the pantyhose and began his ascent up Pams shin, using the threads of the pantyhose like a ladder.
————————————————
9:00am
“DUNDER MIFFLIN THIS IS PAM”
It made Jim’s tiny ears ring, he yelled as he covered them. The sight of Pam’s immensity completely threw him off and he found himself cowering behind a coffee cup. “What if she thinks I’m a bug? I don’t want to risk that.. I should though.. I need to get outta this mess”. Jim had loved Pam for years, unfortunately she was engaged to Roy. That never stopped Jim from flirting. He had to be honest, even from this angle, Pam looked equally as beautiful as she was while he was a normal height. “Ok, no more hiding. If I can get her to hear me first, I’ll stand a chance. I have to get to her shoulder.” Jim made a break for Pams resting hand on her computer mouse.
“NO IM SORRY, JAN.. MICHAELS NOT IN TODAY, HE DIDNT CALL IN SICK SO IM NOT SURE WHERE HE IS... NO JIM IS NOT HERE EITHER... COME TO THINK OF IT, ALMOST NO ONE IN THE OFFICE ARE HERE.. ITS JUST ANGELA, KELLY AND I.”

“Am I not the only one like this?” Jim thought to himself.. he never did hear any other guy come in the past hour. “Whatever, focus man you can do this” Jim said as he made it to Pams pinky that just freely hovered over the desk, not really being used for the mouse like the other digits. “Here goes nothing” said Jim before jumping and grabbing onto Pam’s pinky nail. Pulling himself up, he gazed upward to see Pam completely fixated on her computer screen and finishing her phone call with Jan. Jim then ran across Pams pinky finger onto the football field of Pams back hand. Jim took a minute to observe this new landscape.. hair, moles, wrinkles, it was all completely magnified to him.

“I WILL, THANK YOU JAN” Pam hung up the landline. What was going on? Michael, Dwight, Jim, Oscar, Kevin, Creed.. ok creed is usually late.. but all the other guys.. they’re just gone?

Angela Martin approached the reception desk. She wore a grey button up shirt, her blonde hair draped down. “Have you gotten any calls from anyone?”
“No one. It’s like they all evaporated” Pam joked. “Well when you’re done making entertaining comments, I’ll be at my desk awaiting information” Angela huffed as she turned and walked back to accounting. Pam rolled her eyes and returned her attention back to her computer, moving some loose hair behind her ear.

Jim was frozen once mega Angela approached the desk. The sudden appearance caused him to fall and grip the skin of Pam’s ring finger. But the worst wasn’t over, the minute Angela walked away, the ground beneath him rose, causing him to reach out and grab Pams engagement ring. Jim yelled as he saw his inevitable destination: Pams reddish hair. The movement was so quick Jim lost his grip and was hurtled to a spot above Pams forehead, but deep in the forest nonetheless.

What happens next?
112.title: Michael jumps on to Pams shoes

115.content:
“What is that on the floor? Ew, is that a bug?” Pam’s voice booms over the ant sized Michael. “Ugh, Dwight probably tracked them in. Better just take care of it myself.” Pam raised her black heel until it covered Michael’s vision. Soon the shadow of Pam’s foot completely covered Michael.
“Pam! No! It’s Michael! Your boss!” Michael screamed praying he could at least get Pam’s attention.
115.title: Pam see something on the floor

choices: Pam sees the “ant guts” and feels disgusted
1151.content:
Pam giant shoe comes crashing down on Michael.

Pam: Take that you stupid ant

Pam continues to walk to her desk but what she doesn’t realise is that Michael is actually stuck on Pam’s shoe in a crevice. Pam sits on her desk unaware that Michael is stuck on the bottom of her shoe.

Pam Is dangling her shoe with her toes and Michael can feel the wind and speed and is feeling noucious.

Michael: Well I guess this is as close as I’m gonna get to being with a women for while I guess. I gotta find a way on top of her “that’s what’s she said 😅”.

What happens next.
1151.title: Pam steps on Michael

choices: Angela sees Michael but thinks he’s a bug
Angela see’s an actual ant and steps on it
12.content: Angela walked in her black high heels, a tight skirt, and a fitted buttoned down shirt. Maybe she’ll hear me since she’s so short Micheal joked to himself. Michael jumped up and down waving his arms around hoping Angela would see the now ant sized boss. “Hey short stuff! Down here! It’s me, shorter stuff! No but really it’s me Michael!”
12.title: Angela Martin

choices: Angela decides to pick up the bug sized Michael
123.content: “Ugh, I can’t stand seeing bugs in the office. This is supposed to be a clean work space. If maintenance won’t take care of these bugs, then I will.” The goddess sized Angela raised her giant heel to step on her micro sized boss. “Don’t step on me pipsqueak! It’s me, Michael!” Michael started to run as Angela foot slammed down next to him as she missed the bug sized man. “Come on, you little pest! squish under my shoe!” Angela yelled down at the bug
123.title: Angela sees Michael but thinks he’s a bug

choices: Jan looks down and finds Michael
Jan is interrupted by either Pam or Angela
Jan thinks Michael is a bug
13.content: Jan walked in wearing tall black high heels, a tight pantsuit and a revealing blouse, storming in to find Michael. Oh look, my lover thought Michael. Jan impatiently tapped her foot looking for Michael, causing the ground to shake beneath Michael. “Jan! Hey lover! It’s me down here! Michael! I shrunk and I can’t get up!”
13.title: Jan Levinson

choices: Get her attention from down below
132.content:
Michael heard the colossal giant's footsteps booming closer towards him. Jan is a giantess and her heels crash onto the rug, creating thunder-like claps. Yowza, Michael Scott though, she's like a sexy Statue of Liberty. Still as she takes these steps closer he realizes he can get squashed and this situation is highly dangerous. He ran under the door of his closed office. It would be safe in there since no one ever wanted to go in. That is usually how the day goes but to Michael's surprise, he heard the doorknob turning and a titanic being coming inside the dark office. Michael scurried across the rug towards the safety of being underneath the huge desk. He watched in awe as Jan's gargantuan heels stepped forward and the door closed behind her. There was a few seconds of darkness before the light clicked in and Jan was shuffling around, sighing in annoyance, and checking reports on her phone. Michael hadn't seen Jan in a few days and it wasn't like her to come into his office, especially if he is not there.

Michael is further surprised as Jan took a seat and stretched, groaning in relief. The entire seat shook around as Jan stretched her back onto it, rubbing her tired muscles into the leather. Underneath the desk, Michael is watching his giant boss and occasional lover get very comfortable. Down in between her heels, his view is disrupted when the giant shoes shake around. He tries to run out of the heel's damage range but is knocked over as she kicked off her heels. A giant leather shoe flew off almost crushing Michael in a second. When he lifted himself back up, his heart beating fast with fear and arousal, he now saw Jan's huge nylon-covered feet under the desk, her humongous toes settling onto the rug.
132.title: Jan doesn’t see Michael

134.content:
“Where is that idiot?” Jab asked herself in frustration. “Jan, I’m down here!” Michael shouted running closer to his beautiful goddess sized boss.

“He better have the presentation ready.” Jab said looking up at the ceiling near the reception desk with a sigh.

Moments later Michael reached her black high heels.
“Women in this company need to be in charge of the men.” Jan said to herself looking at the company’s poor annual report.. “I swear if he doesn’t have the female empowerment presentation ready I will end him.” Jan said.

This made Michael pause with fear. “I would crush him like a bug right now if I could. Jan said clenching her hands into fists. “He is such a little loser, sometimes I wonder why I was with him, I need to find a new man.

After she said this Michael began to run away. As he was running away from the angry giantess, Jan looked down and saw him running towards his office room.

“Oh my God is that a bug!” Jan said inching closer to her shrunken male subordinate. “No Jan it’s me Michael!” Michael shouted waving his arms.

But it was too late. Jan’s high heels cast a huge shadow of the tiny pathetic man and stepped on him.

After her heel hit the floor Michael realized he was still alive. Her shoe had just missed him but she thought she had killed the “bug.” He realized the best he could do was play dead.

Unfortunately for Michael Jan grabbed a tissue with used gum inside from her purse and plucked the bug sized man off the floor with it. Michael was stuck to the gum unable to get free.

She walked to the ladies room and threw the tissue in one of the toilets. “I should go the bathroom now.” Jan thought to herself sitting down on the toilet.

After she removed her sexy black panties her huge vagina, ass, and clit cast a shadow over Michael as he struggled to get free from the gum in the tissue. “Nooooooooo!” Michael screamed as Jan...
134.title: Jan thinks Michael is a bug
